body:
Hey guys!

Lemme get straight to the point,I need particles.I know what particles to use but I dunno how to combine them all =(.So lemme give you guys all the particles,and if someone is nice enough they will combine them for me xD


Sharp particles-https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yG0JhcNaj8M (Ngal's pack)

Crit particles-https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pWddlUIWrnM (Huahwi's pack)

Potion particles-https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8IodNEFRJ0E (Croc's pack <3)

Thanks guys!

title: Help with particles in my texture pack

replies.body: I like my GG particles when I hit someone and my EZ particles when I crit :3
replies.body_tagged: I like my GG particles when I hit someone and my EZ particles when I crit :3

replies.body: I took the faithful texture pack, Faithful and just dragged the elements from texture pack files into the folder such as: low fire, EZ and GG particles and Dokucraft Water/Lava into the texture pack file in the correct catagorized file
